0.title: System requirements
0.content: . | A modern GPU | Windows or Linux (macOS is not officially supported) | .

1.title: Installation
1.content: . | Clone EcoSim: git clone https://github.com/wheitman/ecosim | If you haven’t already, download and install the Unity Hub | In Unity Hub’s “Projects” tab, click Add -> Add project from disk. | Click the EcoSim project that you’ve added to open it. | You’ll likely be asked to install the editor version that matches EcoSim (e.g. 6000.0.40f1). Go ahead and do that. | .

2.title: Home
2.content: EcoSim is a simulator for farm robotics.
